text:
I just keep trusting my Lord
As | walk along,

| just keep trusting my Lord,
And He gives me a song,
Though the storm clouds
darken the sky,

O'er the heavenly trail,

| just keep trusting my Lord,
He will never fail.

He's a faithful friend, -2
Such a faithful friend,-2

| can count on Him,-2

To the very end.-2
Though the storm clouds
darken the sky,

O'er the heavenly trail,


| just keep trusting my Lord,
He will never fail.
